metadata.description: This ruleset provides migration rules to Hibernate ORM 6.

hint.title: String-based approaches for specifying Types to use have been removed
hint.message: As part of the Hibernate ORM 6.0 release, mapping annotations have been modernised and made more type-safe. These annotations must be removed. See the User Guide for details about mapping your domain model.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Type System
Hibernate ORM 6 user guide - Domain model

hint.title: String-based approaches for specifying Types to use have been removed
hint.message: As part of the Hibernate ORM 6.0 release, mapping annotations have been modernised and made more type-safe. Annotation attributes accepting types as String have been removed. See the User Guide for details about mapping your domain model.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Type System
Hibernate ORM 6 user guide - Domain model

hint.title: Basic mappings are no longer configurable through the BasicType contract
hint.message: Basic mappings are no longer configurable through the BasicType contract. Instead, users configure the different aspects of mapping the basic value to the database. See migration guide for more details.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Type System

hint.title: StandardBasicTypes class now exposes fields of type BasicTypeReference
hint.message: The `StandardBasicTypes` class previously exposed `BasicType` instance fields, which now have been replaced with fields of the type `BasicTypeReference`.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Basic Types

hint.title: Renaming of JavaTypeDescriptor contract
hint.message: The interface `org.hibernate.type.descriptor.java.JavaTypeDescriptor` must be renamed to `org.hibernate.type.descriptor.java.JavaType`.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Type System

hint.title: Renaming of SqlTypeDescriptor contract
hint.message: The interface `org.hibernate.type.descriptor.sql.SqlTypeDescriptor` has been renamed to `org.hibernate.type.descriptor.jdbc.JdbcType`.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Type System

hint.title: The CompositeUserType interface has been reimplemented
hint.message: The CompositeUserType interface was re-implemented to be able to model user types as proper embeddable types. See the migration guide for more information.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - CompositeUserType

hint.title: Property hibernate.hql.bulk_id_strategy has changed
hint.message: The configuration property `hibernate.hql.bulk_id_strategy` was changed to `hibernate.query.mutation_strategy` which now refers to classes or objects implementing `org.hibernate.query.sqm.mutation.spi.SqmMultiTableMutationStrategy`.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Multi-table Mutation Queries

hint.title: Stream#close() must be called explicitly to close the underlying resources
hint.message: `jakarta.persistence.Query#getResultStream()` and `org.hibernate.query.Query#stream()` no longer return a Stream decorator. In order to close the underlying IO resources, it is now necessary to explicitly call the `Stream#close()` method. This change makes the Streams returned by Hibernate behave as defined in the JDK Stream documentation, which is quite explicit about the need for an explicit call to close by the user to avoid resource leakages.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Stream

hint.title: The signature of the Interceptor#onSave method has been changed
hint.message: The signature of the `Interceptor#onSave` method has been changed to account for the general change in expected identifier type from `Serializable` to `Object`. See migration guide for more information.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Interceptor

hint.title: The contents of the loader.collection package have been restructured
hint.message: The contents of the `loader.collection` package were restructured into `loader.ast.spi` and `loader.ast.internal` as well as adapted to the SQM API.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Restructuring of org.hibernate.loader

hint.title: The contents of the loader.custom package have been moved
hint.message: The contents of the `loader.custom` package were adapted and moved to `query.sql`.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Restructuring of org.hibernate.loader

hint.title: The contents of the loader.entity and loader.plan packages have been removed
hint.message: The contents of `loader.entity` and `loader.plan` were removed

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Restructuring of org.hibernate.loader

hint.title: The contents of sql.ordering have moved
hint.message: The contents of `sql.ordering` were adapted and moved to `metamodel.mapping.ordering.ast`.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Restructuring of the SQL package

hint.title: Some classes of the sql package that were previously used for building SQL were removed
hint.message: Classes of the sql package that were previously used for building SQL, but aren’t needed anymore, were removed. The SQL generation is now fully handled through the `SqlAstTranslator` which a `Dialect` exposes a factory for.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Restructuring of the SQL package

hint.title: Support for basic property mappings with multiple columns was removed
hint.message: In Hibernate 6.0 the support for basic property mappings with multiple columns was removed. The only use case for that was when a `CompositeUserType` was in use, which was reworked to now work on top of components.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - hbm.xml multiple <column/> now disallowed

hint.title: Legacy Hibernate Criteria API has been removed
hint.message: The legacy Hibernate Criteria API which was deprecated back in Hibernate 5.x and removed in 6.0. Usually, all queries using the legacy API can be modeled with the JPA Criteria API. In some cases it is necessary to use the Hibernate JPA Criteria extensions.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Legacy hibernate criteria API

hint.title: The Query#iterate() method has been removed
hint.message: The Query#iterate() method has been removed. See link for alternatives.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Iterate

hint.title: Using NativeQuery to call SQL functions and procedures is no longer supported
hint.message: Using `NativeQuery` to call SQL functions and procedures is no longer supported. `org.hibernate.procedure.ProcedureCall` or `jakarta.persistence.StoredProcedureQuery` should be used instead. `@NamedNativeQuery` references defining execution of procedure or functions should be migrated to use `@NamedStoredProcedureQuery` instead.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Callable via NativeQuery

hint.title: Using NativeQuery to call SQL functions and procedures is no longer supported
hint.message: The fetch all properties clause was removed from the HQL language without a replacement. See link for replacement info.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - HQL fetch all properties clause

hint.title: Hibernate no longer provides built-in support for integrating itself with JMX environments
hint.message: Hibernate no longer provides built-in support for integrating itself with JMX environments.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - JMX integration

hint.title: Hibernate no longer provides built-in support for integrating itself with JACC environments
hint.message: Hibernate no longer provides built-in support for integrating itself with JACC environments.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - JACC integration

hint.title: Removed hibernate classloader properties
hint.message: These properties are deprecated: use `hibernate.classLoaders` instead.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Previously deprecated features

hint.message: This property has been removed: use `jakarta.persistence.create-database-schemas` or `hibernate.hbm2ddl.create_namespaces` instead

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Previously deprecated features

hint.title: Community dialects moved to a separate module
hint.message: As of Hibernate 6.0, some dialect classes that are maintained by vendors or individuals, as opposed to the Hibernate team. have moved to a separate Maven artifact: `org.hibernate.orm:hibernate-community-dialects`.

link.title: Hibernate ORM 6 migration guide - Community dialects
